mapper.sql: id, user_name, gender, phone_number, email, nickname, avatar, birthday, certificate_card, certificate_card_address, prov_city_district, contact_address, highest_education, graduated_from, major, marital_status, open_id register_time, create_id, create_user, create_time, update_id, update_user, update_time, status, nation, ancestral,description
mapper.select: SELECT ui.id, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.gender, li.mobile_number AS phoneNumber, ui.email, ui.avatar, ui.nickname, ui.open_id, li.last_check_sms AS lastCheckSms, ssi.comp_id AS companyId, sdi.id AS deptId FROM sys_user_info ui JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_pwd, last_check_sms, mobile_number FROM sys_login_info WHERE login_name = #{userName} and status=0 UNION SELECT user_id, user_pwd, last_check_sms, mobile_number FROM sys_login_info WHERE mobile_number = #{userName} and status=0 ) li ON ui.id = li.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id=ui.id and ssi.`status`=0 LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON sdi.staff_id=ssi.id WHERE ui. STATUS = 0 limit 1

SELECT li.user_pwd userPwd FROM sys_user_info ui JOIN ( SELECT user_pwd, user_id FROM sys_login_info WHERE login_name = #{userName} and status=0 UNION SELECT user_pwd, user_id FROM sys_login_info WHERE mobile_number = #{userName} and status=0 ) li ON ui.id = li.user_id WHERE ui. STATUS = 0 limit 1
SELECT count(1)>0 FROM sys_user_info WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}

SELECT sci.company_name AS companyName, ssi.id AS staffId, sui.user_name AS userName, sui.phone_number AS phoneNumber, sui.email AS email, sui.avatar AS avatar FROM sys_user_info sui LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id=ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON ssi.comp_id=sci.id WHERE sui.`status` = 0 AND sui.id=#{id}
